mn122:7.3: sannisādeti ekodiṃ karoti → ekodikaroti (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn122:18.1: dhammā ekantakusalā kusalāyātikā → dhammā ekantakusalāyatikā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); dhammā ekantakusalāyātikā (si)
mn122:19.2: api paṇujjamāno”ti → api panujjamānoti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); api panujjamānopīti (si); apipayujjamānoti (sya-all, km)
mn122:20.1: veyyākaraṇaṃ tassa hetu → veyyākaraṇassa sotuṃ (sya-all); veyyākaraṇassa hetu (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mn122:22.4: mucchaṃ nikāmayati → mucchati nikāyamati (bj); mucchati kāmayati (si, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn122:27.3: pavayha pavayha, ānanda, vakkhāmi → pavayha ānanda pavayha vakkhāmi (bj); pavayha pavayha (pts-vp-pli1ed); paggayha paggayha ānanda vakkhāmi (mr)
